mapper.insert: insert into sys_role_resources (id, role_id, resources_id, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{resourcesId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select id, role_id, resources_id, create_time, update_time from sys_role_resources
